Serialized Form

  • Package com.rad

    • Class com.rad.Game extends java.awt.Canvas implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • thread

          java.lang.Thread thread
          The thread the game loop runs on.

        • isRunning

          boolean isRunning
          Represents if the game is running; the game loop is looped through as long as this is true.

        • gameWorld

          com.rad.world.GameWorld gameWorld
          Represents the world that game play occurs.

        • mouse

          com.rad.input.MouseInput mouse
          Handles all user mouse interaction.

        • keys

          com.rad.input.KeyInput keys
          Handles all user keyboard interaction.

        • hud

          com.rad.gui.Hud hud
          The HUD (Headless User Display) displayed during game play.

        • startMenu

          com.rad.gui.StartMenu startMenu
          The start menu.

        • endMenu

          com.rad.gui.EndMenu endMenu
          The game over menu.

        • window

          com.rad.gui.Window window
          The window our game is drawn on, uses a JFrame.

        • spritesheet

          java.awt.image.BufferedImage spritesheet
          The assets for the game: images and fonts.

        • floor

          java.awt.image.BufferedImage floor

        • fontPlayingScore

          java.awt.Font fontPlayingScore

        • fontEndScore

          java.awt.Font fontEndScore

        • fontEndRank

          java.awt.Font fontEndRank

        • gameState

          Game.GameState gameState
          The state the game is in.
